service.title: Premium Services
service.subtitle: Health & Beauty Hair® by Cristina Codreanu
service.intro: At Health & Beauty Hair®, every service is designed as an exclusive experience, where hair health, innovation, and advanced aesthetics meet for visible and lasting results.

service1.title: Innovative Hair Evolution® Straightening
service1.description: An exclusive organic straightening method, performed with advanced technologies, adapted to all hair types and textures. It provides perfect smoothing, discipline, and shine without compromising the hair fiber structure.

service2.title: Advanced Reconstruction Treatments
service2.description: Premium protocols dedicated to deep hair fiber restoration, working from the inside out. They restore elasticity, strength, and vitality to damaged, chemically treated, or fragile hair.

service3.title: Aesthetic Trichology
service3.description: Specialized diagnostic and care services for the scalp and hair fiber, based on aesthetic trichology principles. Each protocol is personalized for balance, health, and lasting results.

service4.title: Premium Personalized Consultation
service4.description: Professional evaluation of hair fiber structure and scalp, with exclusive treatment and maintenance recommendations, tailored to each client's individual needs.

service.signature: Health & Beauty Hair® – services created for those who choose excellence.
